üìã Common JavaScript Array Methods

    

        
            

                Method
                Description
                Example
            

        
        
            

                push()
                Adds item at the end
                
                    
[1,2].push(3) ‚Üí [1,2,3]

                		
            

            

                pop()
                Removes last item
                
                    
[1,2,3].pop() ‚Üí [1,2]

                		
            

            

                shift()
                Removes first item
                
                    
[1,2,3].shift() ‚Üí [2,3]

                		
            

            

                unshift()
                Adds item to start
                
                    
[2,3].unshift(1) ‚Üí [1,2,3]

                		
            

            

                slice()
                Extracts a section
                
                    
[1,2,3,4].slice(1,3) ‚Üí [2,3]

                		
            

            

                splice()
                Removes/replaces items
                
                    
[1,2,3].splice(1,1,99) ‚Üí [1,99,3]

                		
            

            

                indexOf()
                Finds index of value
                
                    
[10,20,30].indexOf(20) ‚Üí 1

                		
            

            

                includes()
                Checks if value exists
                
                    
[1,2,3].includes(2) ‚Üí true

                		
            

            

                reverse()
                Reverses array
                
                    
[1,2,3].reverse() ‚Üí [3,2,1]

                		
            

            

                concat()
                Joins arrays
                
                    
[1,2].concat([3,4]) ‚Üí [1,2,3,4]
